result.arabic_text: وَلِلَّهِۤ يَسۡجُدُۤ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ طَوۡعٗا وَكَرۡهٗا وَظِلَٰلُهُم بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡأٓصَالِ۩
result.translation: Kandi Allah yubamirwa n’ibiri mu birere no mu isi, bibishaka cyangwa bitabishaka; ndetse n’ibicucu byabyo (biramwubamira) mu gitondo na nimugoroba.
